definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: fat, [[דָּשֵׁן]] Is 30:23 (‖[[שָׁמֵן]]), of [[לֶחֶם]] as product of ground; fig. of righteous as trees [[דְּשֵׁנִים]] Ps 92:15 (‖[[רעננים]]) fat, full of oil (?) or sap (Che; cf. [[דֶּשֶׁן]] Ju Jdg 9:9); as subst. vigorous, stalwart ones (opp. [[יוֹרְדֵי עָפָר]] cf. Che) Ps 22:30 [[דִּשְׁנֵי־]] [[אֶרֶץ]] (Brüll [[שׁׂכְנֵי]], Renan:Hist. iii. 134 [[ישְׁבֵי]]).
